item.title: A-F-R-O - Definition of a Rap Flow by All Flows Reach Out
item.description:
A-F-R-O - Definition of a Rap Flow by All Flows Reach Out

17-year-old A-F-R-O drops a remix to R.A. the Rugged Man's Definition of a Rap Flow for a contest.

item.title: Brain Scans of Rappers During Improvisation Show Creativity At Work
item.description:
Brain Scans of Rappers During Improvisation Show Creativity At Work

Rappers improvising rhymes while their brains are being scanned in a functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) machine have provided an insight into the creative process. The scientists published their findings in the journal Scientific Reports . Freestyle rapping, in which a rapper improvises a song by stringing together unrehearsed lyrics, is one of the highest prized skills in hip hop.

item.title: The Rap Monument (Full Length)
item.description:
The Rap Monument (Full Length)

Subscribe to get a ton of swag in our holiday giveaway: http://bit.ly/Noisey-Holiday-Giveaway Thirty-minutes of pure rap bliss from three of sessions held in Los Angeles, Atlanta, and New York. The Rap Monument features white-hot beats coproduced by Hudson Mohawke, Nick Hook and S-Type.

item.title: Watch Mobb Deep's Havoc Cut Up Three Records on Rhythm Roulette
item.description:
Watch Mobb Deep's Havoc Cut Up Three Records on Rhythm Roulette

The Mobb Deep producer cuts up three records for our newest episode. Share You don't need us to confirm that The Infamous is one of the greatest albums of all time, and a huge part of that is due to the eerie strings that loom through the production. Havoc did that.

item.title: Produkt - All Of Me [OFFICIAL VIDEO]
item.description:
Produkt - All Of Me [OFFICIAL VIDEO]

Produkt, the popular Puerto Rican rapper from Bronx releases video for his "ALL Of Me" track off his 2015 Mixtape Inconspicuous. item.title: Female Muslim Hip-Hop Dancers Smash Stereotypes
item.description:
Female Muslim Hip-Hop Dancers Smash Stereotypes

Amirah Sackett and her female Muslim dance group, We're Muslim Don't Panic, spread their hip-hop all over the country to address misconceptions about Muslim women. Subscribe for more videos: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCV3Nm3T-XAgVhKH9jT0ViRg?sub_confirmation=1 Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ajplusenglish Download the AJ+ app at http://www.ajplus.net/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ajplus
